data.title: Movie Extra's - Any kids wanna go to a birthday party?
data.meta_description: My brother is an aspiring director/film producer, and is shooting a movie.  There's a scene he wants to do with a kid's birthday party (at least I think...
data.text:
Joined

Oct 3, 2006

Threads

130

Messages

8,112

Location

Medford, OR

Sep 9, 2009

#1

My brother is an aspiring director/film producer, and is shooting a movie. There's a scene he wants to do with a kid's birthday party (at least I think that's what it is, a party of some sort) with some kids having fun in the background.

No acting or speaking parts, so basically they just show up and be kids. There might be some minor directing.

Details:

Age: 10 or under. (Sorry Tyler, you can't be in the scene. )

Dress: Any cowboy (or cowgirl!) style outfit. (Cap pistols optional. )

Date: Friday, October 2nd

Location: Tentatively my grandparents, just behind Talent (5 minutes or less outside of town).

Food will be provided (hotdogs, hamburgers, etc). I asked, and yes, there will be cake.

Joined

Nov 26, 2005

Location

Oregon

Sep 9, 2009

#2

I've got two under 10 boys that would be all over that. What time would it be? We don't get off work til 5ish but could be present by 5:30...

Thread starter

#3

Not sure at this point. I could probably pick some kids up if needed. I'll ask my bro what time he has planned, but I doubt he's thought that far out.....
